ComicInfo.Summary:
Katie Carva’s chaotic journey continues, as this new season unfolds, the Vampblades twist her life further and further from what it once was!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Marcelo Costa | 3 | | D | Risqué Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Marcelo Costa | 4 | | E | Classic Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Brao | 5 | | F | Risqué Classic Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Brao | 6 |
Note: Issue #40 in a series.
ComicInfo.Title: Back In Black Part Three
